scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Saint Michael, clad in golden armor and a red cape, poised to strike a fallen, demonic creature with his sword. The saint has a halo and is holding a shield. The creature, with feline features and a long tail, lies on the ground, its body colored blue and yellow. The background is a stylized landscape with green foliage and trees under a blue, star-speckled sky, suggesting an outdoor setting. The composition emphasizes the triumph of good over evil.
scene_interpretation: The Triumph of Saint Michael over the Devil
